children.text:
Welcome to this RobotiCode daily Bible product!

This is the expanded verse screen, where you can read the full Bible verse, click and see other translations of it online, or share it with a brother or sister in Christ who you feel might benefit from it.

You should also go to your Home Screen and add the Widget now, so that the daily verse is there for you to read each morning. Clicking on the Widget brings you to this expanded verse screen. If you enjoy using this, please leave some encouraging feedback on Google Play or Amazon appstore, so that we can bring you relevant future Bible products.

We hope you are greatly blessed by these verses, and that you can bless others by sharing verses with them.

Scripture quotations marked (ESV) are from The Holy Bible, English Standard Version (ESV), copyright Â© 2001 by Crossway, a publishing ministry of Good News Publishers. Used by permission. All rights reserved.

Other scriptures taken from either the King James Version, or THE JESUS BOOK - The Bible in Worldwide English. Copyright SOON Educational Publications, Derby DE65 6BN, UK. Used by permission.
